p:
B9: Synthesis of ( E)-3-(4″-nitrophenyl)-1-[4′-(trifluoromethoxy)phenyl]prop-2-en-1-one: Yield: 57%; m.p. 68 °C; R
f = 0.68 (30% Ethyl acetate in Hexane); FT-IR (KBr, cm −1): 1652 (C=O), 1614 (Ar C=C), 1510 (CH=CH), 1242 (-CF 3), 3016 (Ar C-H stretching), 1122 (-C-O-), 1436 (NO 2); 1H NMR (400 MHz, CDCl 3, ppm): δ: 7.06 (1H, d, J = 16 Hz, -CO-CH=), 8.03 (1H, d, J = 16 Hz, Ar-CH=), 7.05–8.04 (4H, m, C-2′, 3′, 5′, 6′, Ar-H), 7.82–8.32 (4H, m, C-2″, 3″, 5″, 6″, Ar-H); ESI-MS [M + H] +: 338.72 and 339.72.
